basic.description:
{Basic Logistics}

Basic Logistics increases your hero's movement points over land by 5%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Logistics}

Advanced Logistics increases your hero's movement points over land by 10%.

expert.description:
{Expert Logistics}

Expert Logistics increases your hero's movement points over land by 20%.

basic.description:
{Basic Scouting}

Basic Scouting allows your hero to see 1 square further into the shroud.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scouting}

Advanced Scouting allows your hero to see 3 squares further into the shroud.

expert.description:
{Expert Scouting}

Expert Scouting allows your hero to see 5 squares further into the shroud.

basic.description:
{Basic Mysticism}

Basic Mysticism allows your hero to regenerate 5 spell points per day.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Mysticism}

Advanced Mysticism allows your hero to regenerate 10 spell points per day.

expert.description:
{Expert Mysticism}

Expert Mysticism allows your hero to regenerate 15 spell points per day.

basic.description:
{Basic Necromancy}

Basic Necromancy allows 5% of the creatures killed in combat to be brought back from the dead as Skeletons.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Necromancy}

Advanced Necromancy allows 10% of the creatures killed in combat to be brought back from the dead as Skeletons.

expert.description:
{Expert Necromancy}

Expert Necromancy allows 15% of the creatures killed in combat to be brought back from the dead as Skeletons.

basic.description:
{Basic Estates}

Your hero contributes 250 gold per day to your cause.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Estates}

Your hero contributes 500 gold per day to your cause.

expert.description:
{Expert Estates}

Your hero contributes 1000 gold per day to your cause.

basic.description:
{Basic Intelligence}

Basic Intelligence increases a hero's normal maximum spell points by 20%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Intelligence}

Advanced Intelligence increases a hero's normal maximum spell points by 35%.

expert.description:
{Expert Intelligence}

Expert Intelligence increases a hero's normal maximum spell points by 50%.
